sources.title: The Vice Squad
sources.description: Title: The Vice Squad Summary: A diplomat is blackmailed by crooked vice cops into helping them frame prostitutes. Directed by: John Cromwell Actors: Paul Lukas, Kay Francis, Judith Wood Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 30 May 1931 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 A diplomat is blackmailed by crooked vice cops into helping them frame prostitutes.
